## nice

css-in-reason. just because.

```reason
open Nice;

let className = css([
  Display(Flex),
  AlignItems(Center),
  Color(Red),
  Select(":hover", [Color(Blue)])
]);
```

## some nice features

* pure reason
* typed css
* glamor-style composition
* escape hatch - `Raw(key, value)`
